body:
Spack should work on Windows.

### Rationale

Right now, I am able to use Spack on Linux and Mac and HPC, but some of our users/customers use Windows, and so we can't use Spack for that. If Spack is to become *the* package manager, it has to support Windows, as it is a very important platform.

### Description

It should support MSVC as one of the compilers and in general compile packages natively on Windows using any compilers that the user selects (MSVC, mingw, ...).
title: Windows Support
